subject: Missing pedal
description_text:
Hello,

I recently ordered the SIMSONN Upgraded PRO Plus Pedals Sim Racing Pedals
PC Racing Simulator Pressure Sensor Load Cell HE Hydraulic Pedals (Black
P3) on Amazon and got the package today. However, I only received two
pedals instead of three. Do you know where this other pedal could be?

conversations.body_text: Hi Derrick Davis,  Could you please provide your Amazon order number? We will check if the wrong item was sent.

- Order # 111-4602835-2783426
